Package service

Class Analytics

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.Analytics
  • public class Analytics
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that models all the data obtained in order to generate the output
    Author:
    sps169, FedericoTB

      Analytics​(java.util.List<MonthData> contaminationData, java.util.List<MonthData> meteorologyData, Station station, java.nio.file.Path uri, long initialTime)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void generateChart​(java.util.List<MonthData> monthDataList)
      Method that generate the charts using JFreeChart each measure type(Histogram for Precipitacion type, BarChart for the rest of types).
      void generateHtml()
      Method that create the output html with each line of the List of String contentHtml and open the default system web browser with him.
      void generatorHTMLBody​(java.util.List<MonthData> monthDataList)
      Method that generate the content of the body of the output html adding line to line with html tags with the values of the MonthData passed in html tables with the data and the png charts generated by the method generateChart for the content of the Data.
      private java.lang.String getEndingDate()
      Method that return the date of maximum date of the measures.
      private java.lang.String getStartingDate()
      Method that return the date of minimum date of the measures.
      void htmlBuilder()
      Method that create the body of the output html adding line to line with html tags and using the method generatorHTMLBody for the content of the Data.

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Analytics

        public Analytics​(java.util.List<MonthData> contaminationData,
                 java.util.List<MonthData> meteorologyData,
                 Station station,
                 java.nio.file.Path uri,
                 long initialTime)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor Method that initialize the variables and call the method generatedChart for each MonthData to generate the body of the html output.
        Parameters:
        contaminationData - that is a List of MonthData of contamination data.
        meteorologyData - that is a List of MonthData of meteorology data.
        station - that is a instance of the Station passed by argument to the program
        uri - that is a Path of directory passed by argument where is will be created the inform.
        initialTime - long used to measure time of execution
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the method write of File fails to write

    • Method Detail

      • generateHtml

        public void generateHtml()
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.net.URISyntaxException
        Method that create the output html with each line of the List of String contentHtml and open the default system web browser with him. If the file existed before is deleted. If the sepator char is of the path is \ is replaced for /.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the method write of File fails to write
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when the method browse of Desktop fails to resolve the syntax of the uri

      • htmlBuilder

        public void htmlBuilder()
        Method that create the body of the output html adding line to line with html tags and using the method generatorHTMLBody for the content of the Data.

      • generatorHTMLBody

        public void generatorHTMLBody​(java.util.List<MonthData> monthDataList)
        Method that generate the content of the body of the output html adding line to line with html tags with the values of the MonthData passed in html tables with the data and the png charts generated by the method generateChart for the content of the Data.
        Parameters:
        monthDataList - that is a List of MonthData with the data of the measures readied

      • generateChart

        public void generateChart​(java.util.List<MonthData> monthDataList)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Method that generate the charts using JFreeChart each measure type(Histogram for Precipitacion type, BarChart for the rest of types).
        Parameters:
        monthDataList - that is a List of MonthData with the data of the measures readied
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the method createFile of Files fails to find the parent directory of the file to create

      • getStartingDate

        private java.lang.String getStartingDate()
        Method that return the date of minimum date of the measures.
        Returns:
        a String with a date in format DD/MM/YYYY

      • getEndingDate

        private java.lang.String getEndingDate()
        Method that return the date of maximum date of the measures.
        Returns:
        a String with a date in format DD/MM/YYYY
